resources.string: \nYou\'re now connected to Microsoft Graph. Tap the button below to send a message from your account using the Microsoft Graph API.\n
\nCheck your inbox. You have a new message :)
\nSorry, can\'t connect to Microsoft Graph.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
\nSorry, can\'t send the email.\nHint: Check logcat for details.
Error connecting to Microsoft Graph\nCheck logcat for details
Error sending email\nCheck logcat for details
The client ID or redirect URI is not valid. Enter a valid client ID and redirect URI in the Constants.java file and run again
